iep_goals: Produce /l/ in all positions of words in multiple sentences during 5 conversation exchanges with 80% accuracy
Produce /th/ in medial position of words in 10 sentences with 80% accuracy
Produce 10 r-blends in initial position of words in 3 or more word phrases with 80% accuracy
accommodations: access to resources and tools (notes, notebook, graphic organizers, text analysis)
small group intervention four times a week for 30 minutes
visuals and videos for vocabulary and spelling

interviews.parent: Parent reported a family history of speech, Autism, and ADHD. Student lives with both parents, siblings, and grandparents.
